twoSetSkill.name: Flame Wreath 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description:
When exiting, unleash a 4-meter radius Flame Blossom that deals 200% ATK of Fire DMG to nearby enemies. CD: 30s.
Kiana or Kallen equip bonus: Release 2 Flame Blossoms.

threeSetSkill.name: Summer Wave 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Flame Wreath radius is expanded by 2 meters and gains 200% ATK of Fire DMG. Each Flame Wreath ignites enemies for 5s, dealing 30% ATK of Fire DMG every 0.5s.
